topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a28d546368725eeb00000e#post_55a28d546368725eeb00000e
It's not sunburn. I have a skin condition called psoriasis. It causes redness, itchiness, and flaking. I have a special shampoo I use for it but recently all that seems to be doing is delaying the inevitable return of the dreaded itch.
